sense.gloss: to fix upon (one-sidedly), to (ignore someone's position and) arbitrarily decide something is the case
to scold, to take (a person) to task

sdata.j: そういうの、↑先入観↑↓せんにゅうかん↓っていうんだよっ！↑体験↑↓たいけん↓したこと↑無↑↓な↓いのに、↑決↑↓|き↓め↑付↑↓つ↓ける|のはよくないっ！
sdata.e: That's what they call 'prejudice'! It's wrong to make your mind up on something you've never experienced!
